entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 09:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
